idea: Our startup M/S. PLAY-FANTASY AND SKILL GAMING PRIVATE LIMITED is a type of game that shall be played using the Internet, where participants assemble imaginary or virtual teams composed of proxies of real players of a professional sport. These teams compete based on the statistical performance of those players in actual games. This performance is converted into points that are compiled and totaled according to a roster selected by each fantasy team's manager. These point systems can be simple enough to be manually calculated by a "league commissioner" who coordinates and manages the overall league, or points can be compiled and calculated using computers tracking actual results of the professional sport. Through our portal, team owners draft, trade and cut (drop) players, analogously to real sports.
name: PLAY-FANTASY AND SKILL GAMING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Tibe Allianz Private Limited offers Creative solutions using technology and innovation- our expertise in sports reform, career guidance, robotics labs, planetarium education for future astronauts, and so forth. Also, in these exponentially changing scenarios and new concepts coming up, thanks to the constant efforts in technological innovation, we consider encouraging research and innovations requisite, especially when it comes to using technology in educational activities to go hand in hand with the changing world. Our quality, innovative, and affordable education solutions can help India truly become a global superpower.
name: TIBE ALLIANZ PRIVATE LIMITED
